mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT a.approval_seq, a.member_email, a.approval_title, a.approval_content, a.approval_at, a.approval_status, m.name AS member_name, m.dept_code, m.level_code FROM approval a JOIN member m ON a.member_email = m.email ORDER BY a.approval_seq DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}
